profile:
Bigger Trucks, Better Prices... Need I Say More…

Our trucks are 40% bigger than our competitors.

Are you thinking of selling your home?
Decluttering your space or garage of undesired junk?
Cleaning out your commercial space or office?
Need help cleaning out an estate ?
Does your yard need a good cleaning?
Did the previous tenants leave the apartment looking like a tornado passed through?
If you got Junk to remove - JUNK GODS™ is easiest solution for all your junk removal needs!

We proudly offer junk removal, donation runs and recycling solutions for your home, commercial space and everywhere in between. Our eco-friendly crew members will remove all your unwanted items from anywhere on your property — and responsibly dispose of them all.

Here's how it works:

1. Call 1-888-992-JUNK or Book directly online at www.junkgods.ca/get-quote
2. We call you to confirm the date and time of your appointment
3. Two JUNK GODS™ team associates will arrive to your home or business.
4. You show them all your unwanted junk
5. One of the team associates gives you the best price to remove your unwanted items
6. After remove the unwanted items, the crew members sweep the area leaving it clean

JUNK GODS™ removes and hauls away (but is not limited to):
- Construction and Renovation Debris
- Garage, Attic, and Basement clean-ups
- Large and Small Appliances
- Furniture Removal
- Mattress Disposal
- Piano Removals
- Paint Disposal
- Computers, monitors, TVs, and other Electronics
- Yard waste Removal
- Hot Tubs and Spas Removals
- Shed demolition and removal
And anything else you can think of...

Call us today 1-888-992-JUNK or Book online www.junkgods.ca and SAVE $30
